the processing of your Personal Data is based on your consent, you have a right to withdraw such consent at any time. However, this will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The basis for you providing Personal Data and Special Categories of Personal Data partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the Personal Data and Special Categories of Personal Data, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys). Not providing your Personal Data and Special Categories of Personal Data when Ricston has indicated you must provide the information may prevent Ricston from carrying out the employment relationship with you and, in some circumstances, may require Ricston to terminate your employment. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
